El hermano del medio,el m√°s caro,pero no solo porque sea un juego muy bueno si no que la comunidad del cs:s sigue a dia de hoy muy activa y por no hablar de que los servidores cuidan muy bien el tema de los hackers al momento su anticheat te banea automaticamente de los servidores.

Recomendad√≠simo.
Un saludo

When the original counter strike came out,it was a instant hit.

Counter strike : Source is technically a remake of the original Counter strike,that adds in new weapons and new maps.

The graphics use the best graphics engine to date,the "source" engine,which is a awesome engine therefore leading to a awesome,realistic looking game,assuming your PC can handle it.

If you've ever played the original CS,you will notice a few gameplay tweaks,like for instance,the restriction of only 1 team change per game.

This game is a stereotype game,with the battles consisting of "terrorists V.S couter terrorists"......But it does'nt change anything about the gameplay therefore not affecting how fun it actually is.

Servers vary from different sizes of maximum players,therefore I can't quite say what the max amount is.

The sound is nice and crisp,but it is'nt the best,if it was just a little bit better,it would satisfy even the most strict gamer.

I love this game,and so do alot of people that I know.

If your looking for a team based multiplayer shooter,I reccomend this.


This game takes ALOT of practice,so don't mind if you die alot when you begin to play.

Enjoy!!!!!
